channel.title: How long does a general anaesthetic affect you?
channel.description: I had a general anaesthetic on Tuesday to have a wisdom tooth removed and I still feel awful. I have no appetite,I feel sick and all I want to do is sleep. Someone told me that the general can continue to affect you for a few days after your op-does anyone know?

item.title: How long does a general anaesthetic affect you?
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
General can affect you for up to a week.

If there are any serious reactions, see your doctor

Read full topic
item.source: How long does a general anaesthetic affect you?

item.title: How long does a general anaesthetic affect you?
item.dc:creator: martingeorg
item.description:
I had a general anaesthetic on Tuesday to have a wisdom tooth removed and I still feel awful.
I have no appetite,I feel sick and all I want to do is sleep.
Someone told me that the general can continue to affect you for a few days after your op-does anyone know?

Read full topic
item.source: How long does a general anaesthetic affect you?
